name: Sanguo Warriors VR
description:
TypeThis is a VR.RPG of realistic cool weapon battle experience.
OperationWe redesigned the game vision, operation, movement, and interactive experience based on VR features.
RPG systemThere are various RPG classic systems such as experience, level, currency, props, weapons, and skills. There are basic games such as weapon shop, war sand table, story level, and BOSS challenge.

Egg whiteIf you read the instructions carefully, the game still has an egg barrier.
Follow-upNow is the basic game demo. We are trying to create a randomly generated level and monster system, and continue to enrich the game scene, monsters, bosses, weapons, and skills.
